about_the_game:
"Fairy Card Battlers" is a digital card game where the fairies of the Touhou universe take center stage.

This game features fast-paced strategic battles that are decided in just 8 turns. Unlike traditional card games, there is no concept of first or second turn, and the choice of card placement creates simple yet deep tactical gameplay. At the start of each turn, players must choose between drawing a card or gaining power (mana), and this choice can determine the outcome of the game. Can you lead Lily White and the fairies to victory?

The game includes a pseudo-multiplayer mode. Build your own deck and aim to become the "strongest" fairy!

Story Mode

A story unfolds around card battles between fairies, starting with Lily White. Lily wants to strengthen her ability cards, Daiyousei is trying to collect Cirno's cards, and each character acts according to their own whims?!

Battle Mode

Use the cards you've obtained throughout the game to build a deck! You can battle against other players' decks. Winning will earn you rewards and a spot in the rankings—lots of good things await!

Additionally, the game is packed with features to support players, including a tutorial mode and an in-game glossary!


Note: This game is a derivative work of the Touhou Project.
